{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by THOMAS for 10/14/2024 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}10/26/2024", "summary": "I contributed to NEAR DevHub by enhancing caching solutions, developing Rocket fairings, integrating Nearblocks services, and testing the Infinex treasury dashboard. Key tasks included authoring regression tests, resolving vulnerabilities, handling transaction hash parsing, and implementing admin balance alerts. I also coordinated with the team on project workflows and critical fixes.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "## Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nWeek 1: October 14 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}October 18\\\\n\\\\n**Monday - 4 hours**\\\\n- Worked on cache api\\\\n- Called with Ori on urgent infinex loading screen\\\\n- Had a call with Peter on quickjs near how it works, what it could be used for.\\\\n\\\\n**Tuesday - 6 hours**\\\\n- Worked on cache api - Rocket fairings and database access through state.\\\\n- Called with Peter and Megha on testing the sputnik DAO / treasury dashboard\\\\n- Wrote two different regression tests for infinex dashboard [#68](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/68) [#69](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/69)\\\\n\\\\n**Wednesday - 4 hours**\\\\n- Attended standup\\\\n- Had a call with Megha on QA testing treasury dashboard\\\\n- Clean up github board\\\\n- Dependabot vulnerability PR [#963](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/963)\\\\n- Writing QA tests\\\\n- Created PR [#72](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/72)\\\\n- \\\\\\\"Don\\\\\\'t ask me again\\\\\\\" test for adding a member, but it doesn\\\\\\'t work at all because \\\\\\\"Don\\\\\\'t ask me again\\\\\\\" is only possible for single methods and not for multi-method transactions.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**Thursday - 2 hours**\\\\n- Writing regression testing cases for Infinex\\\\n- Reviewed [#76](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/76)\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**Friday - 6 hours**\\\\n - Testing infinex treasury dashboard\\\\n - I fixed some pull requests, including [#80](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/80) , and worked on testing the transaction hash parsing issue for Infinex. I did manual testing, wrote regression tests, and finalized PR [#68](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/68) Merged [#72](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/72) , Reviewed [#77](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77).\\\\n \\\\nSaturday - 10 min\\\\n- Reviewed PR [#82](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/82)\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 22 hours\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nWeek 2: October 21 - October 26\\\\n\\\\n**Tuesday - 6 hours**\\\\n- Call with Peter on replacing the indexer with an API, instead of relying on the RPC + contract changelogs we use Nearblocks API to track recent changes so we only upsert data that has changed since last.\\\\n- `devhub-api-rs` restructuring it to resemble race-of-sloths\\\\n- fix an error around aliases macro from utopia\\\\n\\\\n**Wednesday - 7 hours**\\\\n- Added services like api service to interact with nearblocks, background service, RPC service and nearblocks service\\\\n- Work on minimal version of caching using postgres\\\\n- Reviewed [#85](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/85)\\\\n\\\\n**Thursday - 8 hours**\\\\n- Reviewed Megha\\\\\\'s PR [#91](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/91/checks)\\\\n- Updated issue on self create flow contract [#89](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/89)\\\\n- Worked on upserting the single last proposal than has not been updated.\\\\n- Created PR [#971](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/971) \\\\n- Create Issue [#970](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/970)\\\\n- Fixed issue [#969](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/969)\\\\n\\\\n**Friday - 8 hours**\\\\n- Created issue [#972](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/972) , to show the admins of portals that the contract balance is running low when it dips under 2 NEAR\\\\n- Fixed the issue, created the tests and created PR [#973](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/973)\\\\n- Put PR [#916](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/916) in review refactoring events-committee code.\\\\n- Worked on [#930](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/930) to setup the tests for the PR to be able to merge\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 29 hours\\\\n  \\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n## Cost\\\\n\\\\n- Total hours: 22+29=51\\\\n- Rate: $100/hour ~ \\\\u{20ac}90/hour is an average rate for a mid-level freelance front-end web3 developer in the Netherlands, ranging from \\\\u{20ac}35 (absolute beginner) to \\\\u{20ac}150 (senior) [for example](https://zzpservicedesk.nl/uurtarief-freelance-developer/)\\\\n- Total amount: $5100 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "thomasguntenaar.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "5100", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "NEAR"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131371385}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *DevDAO Platform* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @thomasguntenaar.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}DevHub Developer Contributor report by THOMAS for 10/14/2024 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}10/26/2024\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nI contributed to NEAR DevHub by enhancing caching solutions, developing Rocket fairings, integrating Nearblocks services, and testing the Infinex treasury dashboard. Key tasks included authoring regression tests, resolving vulnerabilities, handling transaction hash parsing, and implementing admin balance alerts. I also coordinated with the team on project workflows and critical fixes.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=234)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

10 min\\\\n- Reviewed PR [#82](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/82)\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 22 hours\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nWeek 2: October 21 - October 26\\\\n\\\\n**Tuesday - 6 hours**\\\\n- Call with Peter on replacing the indexer with an API, instead of relying on the RPC + contract changelogs we use Nearblocks API to track recent changes so we only upsert data that has changed since last.\\\\n- `devhub-api-rs` restructuring it to resemble race-of-sloths\\\\n- fix an error around aliases macro from utopia\\\\n\\\\n**Wednesday - 8 hours**\\\\n- Created issue [#972](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/972) , to show the admins of portals that the contract balance is running low when it dips under 2 NEAR\\\\n- Fixed the issue, created the tests and created PR [#973](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/973)\\\\n- Put PR [#916](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/916) in review refactoring events-committee code.\\\\n- Worked on [#930](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/930) to setup the tests for the PR to be able to merge\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 29 hours\\\\n  \\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n## Cost\\\\n\\\\n- Total hours: 22+29=51\\\\n- Rate: $100/hour ~ \\\\u{20ac}90/hour is an average rate for a mid-level freelance front-end web3 developer in the Netherlands, ranging from \\\\u{20ac}35 (absolute beginner) to \\\\u{20ac}150 (senior) [for example](https://zzpservicedesk.nl/uurtarief-freelance-developer/)\\\\n- Total amount: $5100 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "thomasguntenaar.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "5100", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "NEAR"}, "author_id": "thomasguntenaar.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}
